project.title: serial-project-manager
project.summary:
**Project Overview:**
SerialPM is a comprehensive visual-first project management platform designed for modern development teams. It combines intuitive timeline visualization with real-time collaboration features and seamless GitHub integration, allowing teams to manage projects through a highly adaptable and visual interface. The platform stands out for its self-hostable architecture and focus on developer-friendly workflows.

**Key Features:**
* Interactive visual timeline management with drag-and-drop functionality
* Real-time team collaboration with Socket.IO integration
* Direct GitHub integration for automated progress tracking
* Multi-view project visualization (timeline, kanban, list)
* Role-based access control with comprehensive team management
* Self-hostable architecture with Docker support

**Technologies Used:**
Frontend: React 18, Framer Motion, Tailwind CSS, Vite
Backend: Node.js, Express, Socket.IO, MySQL
Infrastructure: Docker, JWT Authentication

**Impact & Benefits:**
SerialPM revolutionizes project management by prioritizing visual representation and real-time collaboration, significantly reducing communication overhead and improving project visibility. Its self-hostable nature and deep GitHub integration make it particularly valuable for development teams seeking complete control over their project management infrastructure while maintaining seamless integration with their development workflow.

This portfolio summary captures the essence of SerialPM as a modern, developer-focused project management solution that emphasizes visual workflows and real-time collaboration. The format clearly presents the key aspects of the project while highlighting its most impressive features and technological achievements.
